title: PFE Icon -- Still Waiting
body:
Broporo, I summon thee to update my account!

http://orig04.deviantart.net/c07a/f/2014/251/0/0/plue_vs_poro___pokemon_style__by_theekprimo-d7yfyt3.jpg

replies.body:
Oh wow!  Broporo is shuffling about somewhere, but I can help!  You know, sometimes I can't tell how you really feel about us then you gotta go and share this _super effective_ art.  I checked your account and it looks like the item was already deposited.    

Now is Throw Cookie a Fairy STAB?  You've really got me overthinking now.  I hope PLUE's journey is full of hope, wonder, and success.  Be sure to pack lots of poro snax for quick level-ups.  I like you.

Well, I love all poros in general -- regardless of my personal feelings about the company's ideologies and implementation of gameplay and champion balance.

That's just one aspect / side though; in general you all do a fantastic job of helping everyone in the community (even the whiny, spoiled bratty ones). 

So yes, poro snax all around. As soon as I find some...
